Title: In The Heat of The Night Season 5

reviewText: I am so happy to see more releases of the this wonderful television series IN THE HEAT OF THE NIGHT coming to DVD, despite the very unusual sequence/release schedule...first the marathon release with selected episodes from each season, then season one followed by season eight - and now seasons four and five. Season three (not yet released), four and five really saw the series hit its stride.Airing for 142 episodes (plus 4 TV movies) from '88-'95, IN THE HEAT OF THE NIGHT is one of my favorite crime drama series that starred Carroll O'Conner in the lead role as "Chief 'Bill' Gillepsie" of the Sparta Police Department in Mississippi and centered on a lot of small town politics as well catching the criminals. It was a role that was really suited for Carrol O'Conner and I was really glad when his real life 'adopted' son Hugh O'Conner's character was given a front and centered role in the series (before his very untimely and tragic death). An of course, Alan Autry as "Lt. 'Bubba' Skinner" sure filled out his uniform v-e-r-y nicely! :o)Please be aware (as stated in the product description) that there are 3 episodes that are not included in this release due to licensing issues: "SWEET, SWEET BLUES", "SANCTUARY", and "LAW ON TRIAL".The picture quality to date on these releases has been very good.Can't wait for seasons 3, 6 and 7 (whichever order they end of coming out - LOL!)
summary: IN THE HEAT OF THE NIGHT SEASON FIVE - SURE GLAD TO SEE MORE RELEASES BECOMING AVAILABLE
Title: In The Heat of The Night Season 5

reviewText: I'm so happy they have finally decided to release the remaining seasons!!!!  For those critics out there who are warning people that episodes are missing....HOLD YOUR BREATH.  There is a VERY CLEAR disclaimer in the description that states there are episodes missing.  There is no need to warn since this this studio obviously isn't trying to hide anything.I LOVED all of my sets, thats correct no spelling errors at all.Just wanted to give a fair review...
Title: In The Heat of The Night Season 5

reviewText: Thank you for this wonderful series. Now I can take them to work with me & let the Boys of Sparta keep me company! Wow! You can't beat that!

reviewText: Enoyed the set. Been watching over and over.  Great show for any fan.  I highly recommend.  I am a huge fan of this show and am collecting the whole series.

Title: In The Heat of The Night Season 5

reviewText: The revelation Chief Gillespie has a daughter is a great story, I gave this only 4 stars because it did not include an award winning episode "Sweet, Sweet Blues" that was part of that season that was a revelation of who killed Wilson Sweet's grandfather, very sad this was left out, Bubba has a baby? well you have to see the Episode "Bubba's baby" to find out, a stalking case, and Parker's Step father returns for a visit, you can't miss this !!
summary: In The Heat of The Night season 5 Revelations
Title: In The Heat of The Night Season 5

reviewText: This is my favorite series. It arrived ahead of scchedual and inn great shape. Very happy withthe vendor. I hope season 2, 3, 5, 6 come out soon.
